events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has multiple scratches and seems defective. This really disappointed me as I expected a new product.
The complaint has been categorized under Product Defect due to reported scratches and damage on the laptop screen.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Emily for further assistance with the damaged product issue.
Hello! I’m Emily, and I’m sorry to hear about the scratches on your laptop screen. Let me help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and confirm when you received the laptop to proceed with the resolution?
Here are the photos showing the scratches on the screen. I received the laptop just yesterday morning, and it is clearly damaged.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement since I still want the same model, but I hope the next one will arrive in perfect condition.
We’ve processed your replacement request. You will receive a new laptop with expedited shipping, and the damaged unit can be returned using the prepaid label.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the replacement and no further issues have been reported, this case is now closed. Thank you for your patience.
